t:
“Please!”
            she asked with big eyes,
     “can we keep it, Daddy?”




He shook his head, annoyed, “No honey.
 We'll try for a boy next time.”
c:
“Cause Mommy isn't here to give us a boy.”



In the period of January 1, 2019, to June 30, 2019, 24,212 cases of child abuse have been registered in India, which means one in every eleven minutes. In 94.8% of child rape cases, children are raped by someone they know. In 10% of cases it is their own direct family members or relatives.
Here's a short film (set in US), about something similar: https://youtu.be/ttJcC_LHuZY





#childsexualabuse #childmolestation #rape #father #ignorance #pregnancy #abortion #girlchild
